name: echoswipe
description: Windows desktop application for capturing gift card data from magnetic stripe readers

scripts.build:echo-ui:check: node scripts/check-echo-ui-build.js && echo 'Skipping Echo-UI build' || cd ../Echo-UI && pnpm build
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:echo-ui:check && concurrently "pnpm run dev:vite" "pnpm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:echo-ui && vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --win portable
scripts.build:exe: pnpm run build:echo-ui && vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --win portable
scripts.build:installer: pnpm run build:echo-ui && vite build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --win nsis
scripts.build:fast: pnpm run build:echo-ui && vite build && cross-env FAST_BUILD=true electron-builder --dir
scripts.build:pack: pnpm run build:echo-ui && vite build && electron-builder --dir

author: The Echo Company
